summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganSustainable PackagingDr. Althea Pure Grinding Cleansing Balm features an innovative built-in grinder for hygienic, precise use every time. With 14 essential ingredients, it gently cleanses sensitive skin while keeping the product fresh and protected from water exposure.
details: DetailsBenefitsInnovative Grinding Packaging: Built-in grinder delivers fresh product with each hygienic and convenient use without direct hand contact with the product.Powerful Yet Gentle Cleansing: Removes sunscreen, waterproof makeup products, and impurities both the surface and deep layers of your skin in one step without the need for double cleansing.Moisturizing Finish: Enriched with Madecassoside and plant-derived oils, it leaves your skin nourished and moisturized, and non-tightening finish.Clinically Proven for Sensitive Skin Free: Formulated without harsh irritants and proven safe for dedicate skin types.Key IngredientsCamellia Sinensis Seed Oil: Deeply moisturizes and nourishes the skinVitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil: Gently yet effectively dissolves impurities for a thorough cleanseMadecassoside: A powerful anti-inflammatory compound that soothes irritation and supports skin healingItem 2647059How To UseTurn the container clockwise to dispense an appropriate amount.Gently massage onto dry skin in circular motions to dissolve makeup.Add a small amount of water to emulsify, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.IngredientsCetyl Ethylhexanoate, Synthetic Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, PEG-10 Isostearate, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Madecassoside, Centella Asiatica Extract, Asiaticoside, Water.
how_to_use: Turn the container clockwise to dispense an appropriate amount.Gently massage onto dry skin in circular motions to dissolve makeup.Add a small amount of water to emulsify, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
